headline: PGIM Closed-End Funds declare distributions for March, April and May 2026
summary: NEWARK, N.J., February 27, 2026--PGIM High Yield Bond Fund, Inc. (NYSE: ISD), PGIM Global High Yield Fund, Inc. (NYSE: GHY) and PGIM Short Duration High Yield Opportunities Fund (NYSE: SDHY) declared today monthly distributions for March, April and May 2026. The distribution amounts and schedule for each fund appear below:
